channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Move-In Parking Lot Closures
item.description:
Due to Fall move-in, and with permission from Parking & Transportation, there will be a series of parking lot closures between August 19th and August 27th. For a full list of parking closures, please go to the following link: https://sll.rpi.edu/announcements/move-parking-lot-closures

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
